summary: Removes the earlier perk prerequisites when choosing perks.  Most perks now only require you to have the appropriate skill level, allowing you to skip useless perks and get the perks you want.
descriptionHtml:
This mod will remove all perk prerequisites from most perks in the game.  They still require that you have the appropriate skill level.  Instead of throwing away your perk points on worthless perks just to get to that one useful perk, you can skip right to the perk you want, so long as you have enough skill.

For instance, if you have 70 Heavy Armor and want weightless armor, you can skip over Fists of Steel and Cushioned and just get Conditioning.  You can now pick up Treasure Hunter in Lockpicking and Extra Pockets in Pickpocket without spending half a dozen perk points.

Some exceptions:

     -  Any perks that follow the Novice->Apprentice->Adept->Expert->Master format retain their requirements, as that represents a progression that should be followed.  Being able to throw down a Firestorm with ease while you struggle with Fireball doesn\'t make a lot of sense.

     -  Steady Hand in the Archery tree still requires Eagle Eye, since Steady Hand won\'t do much without it.

     -  In the same vein, Deadly Bash and Disarming Bash in the Block tree retain their requirements.  Though Disarming Bash now only requires Power Bash.  Once Power Bash is activated, both Deadly Bash and Disarming Bash will unlock.


*****************
There are now two versions of the file, the original and now one with the Smithing materials perks retaining their requirements.  Arcane Blacksmith still has its requirements removed.  If you\'d rather not have the ability to skip the Smithing progression, choose this file.  Don\'t use both files.  They aren\'t compatible.
*****************

*****************
Special thanks to feanbeast for his Ebony Armor Matching Set Fix.  Matching Set does not work for Ebony Armor in Vanilla Skyrim.  feanbeast\'s mod corrects this.  The standalone bug fix can be found at http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2507.  This fix is now incorporated into all files
*****************

To install, extract to your Data folder, and check the esp in Data Files in the game launcher. If Data Files is grayed out, add

bEnableFileSelection=1

to C:\\Users\\*Your User Name*\\Documents\\My Games\\Skyrim\\SkyrimPrefs.ini.

---------------------
Changelog
---------------------
v.1.2 
- Added feanbeast\'s Ebony Armor Matching Set Fix to all files (http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2507).  This corrects a bug in Vanilla Skyrim where Matching Set did not function for Ebony Armor.

v1.1
- Corrected an issue in Compatibility Mod for No Helmets Required where Matching Set was not working for some armor sets.
- Added a compatibility mod for No Helmets Required - http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2460
- Added a Smithing excluded version.
- Corrected an issue in the description of Elemental Protection.  No biggie.
author: ClassicalNoodle
